attributes.review: Well when I go on the app it just glitches the whole time and keeps kicking me out😒 I just want to learn about all of the lies that our president is putting onto the app💁‍♀️ He thinks that he can compress our rights and we will just comply to it🙄 We will keep fighting for the right thing and he isn’t going to have his way🥰
attributes.title: Black, Hispanic, and indigenous Lives Matter

attributes.review: I saw that god himself 🧡 had an app and i just couldn’t wait to download this amazing app. unfortunately 😢, he has time to have an app made but doesn’t have the time to acknowledge the police brutality, and many of the police who have been proven of killing an innocent person are still free. hm. but anyways continue on with your day and of course, heil cheeto🧡
attributes.title: Bit of an issue

attributes.review: Makes it easy to support our president’s re-election campaign. Also provides an all access way to learn about all upcoming events
attributes.title: Great app!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my favorite cheeto! When i first opened the app, everything was normal (there were racists and idiots everywhere 🤪) but then my account got hacked 🤬😡😡🤬😠🤬😡 I continued to use the app anyways. But this time an orange light blinded me to get me to use the app more. it lasted about a week until my friend ate the cheeto! i was so relieved! p.s i will never be using this app again 😌💅✨💕
attributes.title: ✨disgusting✨🤩😍😋🤪🥰

attributes.review: I got this app to support our Cheeto in office but  the first thing I see is the ugliest most stupid race$t homoph0bic crusty old Cheeto🤢🤮. I was in shock...in tears almost. I cannot Believe what my eyes saw. And it asked me for my phone number, I didn’t trust it but I thought why not give it try. 5 seconds later my phone got spammed with tanning products. My phone now has a virus 🦠. PLAESE STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP AND HIS SUPPORTS‼️it’s toxic
attributes.title: OH TO SEE WITHOUT MY EYES

attributes.review: the app hacked into my phone and deleted over a thousand photos. it also deleted about ten apps on my phone and about half of my contacts. after i downloaded the app my dog also started acting very weird and started only eating orange food so eventually he died from too much orange food. i do believe trump did this to my dog, so whatever you do, NEVER get this app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: got this wonderful app to support our ✨wonderful✨ president. let me tell you girl i was shocked. this app seemed to have let the “do nothing democrats” take over my phone. all my ads are biden ads. i cant have that. liberals also have the audacity to ask why i would support a wonderful man like Mr. Trump. i have no answer for them so i usally hit them with the “❄️” or “trump2020🇺🇸”
attributes.title: no❤️ (i’m black btw)

attributes.review:
I bought this for my nieces birthday and it did NOT fit her, she told me later that the color was off and misleading. It came off as annoying and an eyesore. The size is NOT accurate. It squeezes and when you try to wash it or stretch it out it gets TIGHTER.
Long story short it touches the wrong places especially on minors needs to be taken off the store NOW.
attributes.title: :( disappointed

attributes.review:
It was CRAZY, not only did it drain my entire battery in only 3 seconds but it also ended up with my phone shooting out ROACHES FROM THE SCREEN??? It was horrific, I genuinely can’t comprehend how our president let this happen. Not only this but all of a sudden it brain washed me into chanting “White America” or “FAKE NEWS” at the top of my lungs—
It was genuinely disgusting and I do NOT recommend this app. DONT GET IT✨❤️
attributes.title: DRAINS BATTERY AND ALMOST KILLED ME???

attributes.review: This app gave me an immediate virus!!! Suddenly my phone starting crashing, draining my battery, wouldn’t fully charge ever after a full night on the charger, constant pop-up adds, and calls all throughout the night asking to vote for trump. How dare our president ask to download his app just to inconvenience us this much. So disrespectful and rude, I will no longer be voting for this bald orange.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
